document.full_text: fourteen somalis and four yemenis have been arrested on charges that they smuggled and trafficked more than 4.4 tons of the stimulant qat in the united states, prosecutors said thursday.
document.title: somalis and yemenis arrested in qat ring
lines_and_colors: fourteen somalis and four yemenis have been arrested on charges that they smuggled and trafficked more than 4.4 tons of the stimulant qat in the united states, prosecutors said thursday.
